amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to require a 45-day waiting period between Presidential certification and removal of sanctions to provide an opportunity for congressional oversight.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
